item.description:
The Lowell Folk Festival begins this Friday evening, July 27th 6:40PM with a kick-off parade and music and ethnic foods at two performance stages: Dutton Street Dance Pavilion and Boarding House Park

Let's gather at 7:00PM {under the big tent} at the Dutton Street Dance Pavilion for some outdoor music and dancing fun with "J.P. Harris & The Tough Choices", performing   7:15PM - 8:30PM http://lowellfolkfestival2012.sched.org/artist/j.p.harrisandthetoughchoices

followed by "Magic Slim & the Teardrops", http://lowellfolkfestival2012.sched.org/artist/magicslimtheteardrops1

OR after J.P. Harris & The Tough Choices" walk on down to the Boarding House Park for:

"Michael Winograd & the Klezmer Orchestra International", 8:15PM - 9:00PM

"Feufollet", 9:15pm - 10:15pm

See the Full festival performance schedule at: http://www.lowellfolkfestival.org/schedule.html
Lowell Folk Festival: 25 Years of Folk, Food, and Fun!

FREE Admission.

RAIN OR SHINE.

** Note: downtown lowell street parking FREE after 6:00PM

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Music & Dancing in downtown Lowell
